law.catch_line: // EFFECTIVE UNTIL SEPTEMBER 30, 2016 PER CHAPTER 94 OF 2011 //...
law.text:
// EFFECTIVE UNTIL SEPTEMBER 30, 2016 PER CHAPTER 94 OF 2011 //
In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Commission" means the Community Services Reimbursement Rate Commission.
"Provider" means a community-based agency or program funded:
By the Developmental Disabilities Administration to serve individuals with developmental disabilities; or
By the Mental Hygiene Administration to serve individuals with mental disorders.
"Rate" means the reimbursement rate paid by the Department to a provider from State general funds, Maryland Medical Assistance Program funds, other State or federal funds, or a combination of those funds.
